# 60th Baeksang Arts Awards

The 60th Baeksang Arts Awards () ceremony was held at COEX, Seoul on May 7, 2024, at 17:00 (KST). The show was hosted by Shin Dong-yup, Bae Suzy, and Park Bo-gum. It was broadcast live simultaneously in South Korea on JTBC, JTBC2, and JTBC4, and internationally on Prizm.
It is one of South Korea's most prestigious award shows, recognizing excellence in film, television, and theatre, through strict screening conducted by 60 professional evaluators, judges in the industry, and a group of experts.
The nominees were announced on April 8, 2024, via its official website. All works released from April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2024, were eligible for nominations.
Winners and nominees
Winners are listed first and emphasized in bold. Nominees are listed per official website.
